sn17.7:1.3: diddhagatena visallena sallena → diṭṭhigatena visallena (bj); diṭṭhigatena sallena (sya-all, km); diṭṭhagatena visallena sallena (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); diṭṭhigatena visallena sallena (mr) | sekhaṃ → bijjhatu sekhaṃ (bj); sekkhaṃ (sya-all); taṃ sekhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr) | anupāpuṇātu → anupāpuṇāti (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
